titles.title: A bill to require the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of large newspaper printing presses and components thereof.
A bill to require the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of large newspaper printing presses and components thereof.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of large newspaper printing presses and components thereof.
